verses.en: And when the stars fall, scattering
And when the seas are erupted
And when the [contents of] graves are scattered
A soul will [then] know what it has put forth and kept back

verses.ar: يَـٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلۡإِنسَٰنُ مَا غَرَّكَ بِرَبِّكَ ٱلۡكَرِيمِ
verses.en: O mankind, what has deceived you concerning your Lord, the Generous
Who created you, proportioned you, and balanced you

verses.ar: فِيٓ أَيِّ صُورَةٖ مَّا شَآءَ رَكَّبَكَ
verses.en: In whatever form He willed has He assembled you
No! But you deny the Recompense
And indeed, [appointed] over you are keepers
Indeed, the righteous will be in pleasure
And indeed, the wicked will be in Hellfire
They will [enter to] burn therein on the Day of Recompense
And never therefrom will they be absent
And what can make you know what is the Day of Recompense

verses.ar: ثُمَّ مَآ أَدۡرَىٰكَ مَا يَوۡمُ ٱلدِّينِ
verses.en: Then, what can make you know what is the Day of Recompense

verses.ar: يَوۡمَ لَا تَمۡلِكُ نَفۡسٞ لِّنَفۡسٖ شَيۡـٔٗاۖ وَٱلۡأَمۡرُ يَوۡمَئِذٖ لِّلَّهِ
verses.en: It is the Day when a soul will not possess for another soul [power to do] a thing; and the command, that Day, is [entirely] with Allah
